name: Flea the Cat LITE
description:
Welcome to the endless nightmare  Flee from Flea, the giant demonic (definitely-evil) cat in this dark infinite-runner.

Controls

Click on the door to begin, The controls are shown at the bottom of the screen while in game

  •  Z to throw a small enemy
  •  X to eat an unarmoured enemy
  •  Z to claw any enemy
